import React,{useState}from'react';import translations from'../utils/translations';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SongFilter=_ref=>{let{categories,onFilterChange,currentLanguage}=_ref;const[activeCategory,setActiveCategory]=useState('Todos');const t=translations[currentLanguage]||translations['Español'];const handleCategoryClick=category=>{setActiveCategory(category);onFilterChange(category);};const categoryOrder=['Todos','Entrada','Penitencia','Gloria',// Nueva categoría
'Aleluya','Credo','Ofertorio','Santo','Padre Nuestro','Paz','Cordero de Dios','Comunión','Salida','Virgen'];const orderedCategories=categoryOrder.filter(cat=>cat==='Todos'||categories.includes(cat));const getTranslatedCategoryName=category=>{if(category==='Todos')return t.categoryAll;const key="category_".concat(category.replace(/ /g,'_'));return t[key]||category;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8 overflow-x-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex space-x-2 pb-2",children:orderedCategories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleCategoryClick(category),className:"px-4 py-2 rounded-full text-sm font-medium whitespace-nowrap transition-colors ".concat(activeCategory===category?'bg-black text-white':'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-200'),children:getTranslatedCategoryName(category)},category))})});};export default SongFilter;
